abstractText: Otoliths can be used to acquire a variety of information about fish, including its age and its origin. Another reason otoliths may beuseful is for stable isotope analysis, which can be used to ultimately assign the fish a natal stream.Method 1078, LPO Collecting Saggital Otoliths for Ageing v1.0provides sound detail for removal of otoliths, but because of the small size of subyearlingsalmonids(normally 35 mm fork length or greater, see included image showing a juvenile Chinook), a new method rates publication.
title: Otolith extraction and preservation from juvenile salmonid fish v1.0
